name: animation-bracket-syntax

0.2.0.name: animation-bracket-syntax
0.2.0.description: A theme which adds blinking bracket-matcher when you create matching brackets

readme:
# animation-bracket-syntax theme

A theme which when you go on the bracket with a matching one, it will flash yellow.

![A screenshot of your theme](ezgif.com-optimize.gif)
